place_of_publication.publication_title: in W. H. Emory, Rep. U.S. Mex. Bound.

treatment.description: Stems, distal branches, and phyllaries gland-dotted, glands red- or purple-tipped. Involucres 13–17 mm. Ligules yellow, 1.5–2.5 cm. Cypselae tan or straw-colored, deeply grooved between ribs, faces not rugulose. 2n = 14.

habitat_info.text: sandy , gravelly soils , sand dunes , slopes , washes , limestone ridges in lower sonoran zone , mohave and colorado deserts ;
habitat_info.habitat: limestone ridges in lower sonoran zone , mohave and colorado deserts
